Iâ€™m surprised that this game has literally like-... <1K reviews. This game is majestic for a mobile game; Decent graphics, the storyline can get you hooked on like a fish, and the gameplay is simple. This game is slightly buggy but itâ€™s still playable. Itâ€™s a very unique â€˜zombieâ€™ shooter game because it doesnâ€™t just involve shooting up the undead, there are more diverse enemies to combat and itâ€™s sci-fi and we donâ€™t get that a lot in the horror-action genre.

You have to keep replaying scenes youâ€™ve already played because thereâ€™s no save option!  I spent 20 minutes playing and then went to continue and had to start all over again! So Iâ€™ve loved Dead Effect since the first game, I watched as the second was added but than got so confused when both games were removed from app store only to come back again. I lost all my progress and cannot restore the 20$ I spent on this game. I see the developer added updates to the game but Im severely disappointed that the developer didn't patch up the many holes in this game, maybe they are not aware so Iâ€™ll list them. One of the maps in survival mode, Train station, has absolutely no barriers. I can easily fall off the map by walking on one of the boxes and I can climb on boxes just by moving around them (Can do this in several other maps as-well and sometimes get stuck), and when I do so the zombies disappear. I really think this should be fixed because itâ€™s easy to cheat the game and harvest money without doing any work. Also Im confused as to why the crouch button is now gone, I used it in the past to aim better and sneak around during story mode. I know it is still there because I can fiddle with the size of the button in the control layout menu but during game it is never visible. Other than that I have recommendations; There should be more modes to make the game funner and to make it easier to get money, like if there was a mode where you could only use melee weapons or something challenging like that, thatâ€™d be fun. And just in general, there should be lots more to do so you can progress in story mode better. Thanks for reading, Iâ€™ll have more to add in the future because I know this game has lots of potential but I have yet to cone up with more ideas.

1.  Fantastic audio and graphics.
2.   Monotonously tedious gameplay. 
3.  Minikin absolutely annoying. 

Right now, 1 is outweighing 2 and 3. 
Itâ€™s what got you 3 stars.  

Depending on how 2 goes, that  will decide whether it goes to 1 star and uninstall or not.

I love the game and have played it on and off for close to a year. The graphics and sounds are amazing for a mobile game and the side quests really keep you going even after the well constructed campy. The only complaint I have is that itâ€™s way too time consuming to get all the boss kills required for weapons training. Needing 30-50 Boss kills is way too much for how long it takes to actually get to a boss. Even with maxed out weapons it takes a minimum of 3 minutes before you can get to a boss and kill it. I suggest either lowering the boss kill requirements or providing a faster way to get them. Another addition that I believe would make the game more enjoyable would be an endless survival mode that becomes progressively harder.

This game is awesome for a mobile FPS, although I am wondering I am able to hook up a Bluetooth controller to my iPad (the steam controller) yet it doesnâ€™t seem to function in the game despite it able to control the iPad itself, is it possible to add support for it?

For the touch layout it would be wonderful if all aspects of the ui could be moved around in order to accommodate tablet users such as myself)

Also I have both the old app and the new one and want to transfer my old data to the new app. , I would also like to see cross device cloud syncing over Facebook or another service so I can play the game on one device and continue on another device (like an android device)

One thing Iâ€™ve noticed is that despite the game being on the highest graphic quality, the models and shadows still look like utter crap, 

Certain animations could be a bit less stiff,

and by a personal preference the voice acting could use a do-over cause it seems so generic and flat-toned, and doesnâ€™t exactly fit the characters.

the characters themselves could be a bit more expressive with the addition of idle animations or something

Similar to how you replace the armor and implants.

title.label: Great gameplay/story but the in-game currency system needs to be balanced.

content.label:
I really enjoyed the first Dead Effect and since Iâ€™d recently upgraded from an iPhone 6 to an XS, that meant I finally had enough storage space to install the game so I went ahead and did. I looked up some videos of people playing to learn a few tips and tricks and one thing I noticed from watching old gameplay was that you donâ€™t earn nearly as many credits per mission anymore as you could before the game was deleted and this version took its place. You literally earn about 10% of what used to be possible. Plus the best weapons/armor cost crystals rather than credits but you wonâ€™t get enough of those unless you pay for them with real money.

I understand that the game is free and was made by a small group of developers so they need those micro transactions, but it feels like the game could be balanced a bit better for those of us who like to play to win, not pay. Mind you, Iâ€™m more than willing to pay real money but would prefer to do it because I want to, not because I have to. Anyway, itâ€™s still a great game and Iâ€™d recommend it to anybody with the patience to grind their way through it.
